summary: In this irreverent comedy, a failed actor-turned-worse-high-school-drama-teacher rallies his Tucson, AZ students as he conceives and stages politically incorrect musical sequel to Shakespeare's Hamlet.
cast: Steve Coogan|Catherine Keener|Joseph Julian Soria|Skylar Astin|Phoebe Strole|Melonie Diaz|Arnie Pantoja|Michael Esparza|Natalie Amenula|Marshall Bell|David Arquette|Elisabeth Shue|Amy Poehler|Shea Pepe|Marco Rodríguez|Deborah Chavez|Kevin Wiggins|Johnnie Hector|Nat Faxon|Steve Corona|Arron Shiver|Josh Berry|Margarita Wilder|Evan Adrian|J.D. Garfield|Mary Evans|Tomas Sanchez|Mike Hatfield|John Hardman|Stephen Eiland|Cynthia Straus|Will Gluck|Tom Romero|Jenny Gabrielle|Frank Bond|Todd Anderson|Daniel Quiñones|Karin Arellano|Sian Bird|Jessica Daniels|Tina Kozlowski|Joey Montoya|Hannah Rodananta|Gabriel Romero|Valerie Adams|Arlin Alcala|Robert Anthony Brass|Thomas Brungardt|Gabriel Alicto Chavez|Rich Gill|Z. title: Hamlet 2
